name: Polonius or Is Brevity the Soul of Wit?
name_original: Polonius or Is Brevity the Soul of Wit?
description:
Polonius or Is Brevity the Soul of Wit? is an adventure game developed by stephenfruchtman. It came out on 07-04-2015.
You can play Polonius or Is Brevity the Soul of Wit? on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
